titleStmt.title: A marvelous medicine to cure a great pain, if a maiden-head be lost to get it again

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and VV. Gilbertson,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Once busie in study betwixt night and day".
Imprint, place of publication from Wing, which estimates 1658-1664 as publication date.
Printed on verso: A pr[etty ne]w ballad, intituled, Jepha judge of Israel.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
